name: Arm Wrestling VS 2 Player
description:
If you looking for fun 2 player game this is definitely for you! It's based on Arm Wrestling sport and designed for a single and 2 players game. Who is stronger? Which player will slide faster? It’s time to see who will win the battle! Try Arm Wrestling Simulator at the party with your friends.

Have fun with our game by challenging your friends and beat them. Multiplayer Arm Wrestle game on a single device!

5 characters opponent in single mode, 8 difficulty level each! Unlock and defeat them all.

Challenge Your Friends (2P) requires two players and one device. This is not an online multiplayer game, both players play on the same phone or tablet. The game can be also played by one player in single mode. The goal is to pin the other's arm onto the surface, the winner's arm over the loser's arm. Great party game! Beautiful low poly 3D model in modern design. The game is fully animated.

Slide faster than your opponent and win! The best ArmWrestling 3D game on market. It's FREE, no microtransaction! In this game, you don't have to own bigger arm or biceps to win in arm wrestling :)

Arm Wrestling VS 2 Player features:
● 1 Player Mod: 5 unique opponent characters, 8 difficulty level each.
● 2 Player Mod: challenge your friend.
● Modern low poly 3D design.
● Unique gameplay and user experience.
